basics.name: Onur Akköse
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying in Computer Engineering at the Dumlupınar University. I expect to graduate in June, 2021. I am Data Science and Machine Learning enthusiast. I spend %90 of my time learning new algorithms,frameworks or networks. I write about Deep Learning for Analytics Vidhya and Deep Learning Türkiye on Medium.

summary.name: I am studying in Computer Engineering(4th) and I except to graduate in June 2021. I am Machine Learning and Deep Learning enthusiast. I regularly write about Machine Learning- Deep Learning for Analytics Vidhya and Deep Learning Türkiye on Medium. I spend 90 percent of my time learning new algorithms, networks and frameworks. I love reading articles, posts and watching tutorial series. Throughout my study, I developed many applications with different programming languages. Also, I used databases in various for my applications.
